tool_description: Calculates the total material cost for a project based on yarn selections, quantities, and current market pricing ranges.

yarn_types.description: List of yarn types being considered

quantities_yards.description: Yarn quantities needed in yards, corresponding to yarn_types

quality_level.description: Desired yarn quality (budget, mid_range, premium, luxury)

include_shipping.description: Whether to include estimated shipping costs

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: yarn_types and quantities_yards arrays must have the same number of elements.
Invalid yarn quantities: All quantities must be positive integers greater than 0.
Unsupported quality level: Quality level must be one of: budget, mid_range, premium, or luxury.
Unknown yarn type: One or more yarn types are not recognized. Use standard fiber names like wool, cotton, alpaca, silk, acrylic.
usage: Provide yarn_types array and corresponding quantities_yards array, specify quality_level for pricing tier. Optionally set include_shipping to get total project cost including delivery estimates.

individual_costs.description: Cost breakdown for each yarn type

subtotal.description: Total cost before shipping and taxes

cost_per_yard.description: Average cost per yard across all materials

budget_category.description: Overall budget assessment (economical, moderate, expensive, luxury)
